MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetDomainName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetDomainName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetDomainName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetDomainName
param.span: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.

span.span: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: The password for the trust.

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método crea un lado de una relación de confianza.This method creates one side of a trust relationship. La relación de confianza no se establece hasta que se han creado ambos lados de la relación de confianza.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. El `trustPassword` parámetro asocia una contraseña con la confianza creada.The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. Cuando se crea el otro lado de la relación de confianza, se proporciona la misma contraseña y, a continuación, se enlazan las dos confianzas locales entre sí.When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. Para crear mediante programación ambos lados de una relación de confianza en una única llamada al método, utilice el método.To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

exception.span: The trust relationship already exists.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

exception.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

summary.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

span.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método crea ambos lados de una relación de confianza con una única llamada al método.This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. El método se usa para crear un solo lado de una relación de confianza.The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers() cil managed

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

returns.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede encontrar los controladores de dominio detectables consultando los registros SRV de DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Este método devolverá solo aquellos controladores de dominio que registre el genérico, específico de sitio, el registro SRV de controlador de dominio.Only those domain controllers that register the generic, non-site-specific, domain controller SRV record will be returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers (siteName As String) As DomainControllerCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.

span.span: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.

returns.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede encontrar los controladores de dominio detectables consultando los registros SRV de DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Si un controlador de dominio no registra un registro SRV para el sitio especificado, este método, no se devolverá incluso si el controlador de dominio se encuentra físicamente dentro de ese sitio.If a domain controller does not register an SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the domain controller is physically located within that site. Se devolverán todos los controladores de dominio que registran un registro SRV para el sitio especificado por este método, aunque no estén ubicados físicamente dentro de ese sitio.All domain controllers that register an SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they are not physically located within that site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetComputerDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetComputerDomain () As Domain

summary.span: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.

span.span: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.

returns.span: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

span.span: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El valor devuelto de la método es un objeto que representa el dominio al que está unido el equipo que ejecuta la aplicación.The return value of the method is a object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined. Este valor devuelto es independiente de las credenciales de dominio en la que se ejecuta la aplicación.This return value is independent of the domain credentials under which the application is run. Este método recupera el dominio del equipo, independientemente de se ejecuta bajo las credenciales de dominio de cuenta de confianza.This method will retrieve the computer's domain regardless of the trusted account domain credentials it is run under. Para recuperar el objeto que representa el dominio correspondiente al usuario las credenciales en vigor para el contexto de seguridad en que se ejecuta la aplicación, use el método en su lugar.To retrieve the object that represents the domain corresponding to the user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running, use the method instead.

exception.span: A connection to the domain could not be made.

span.span: A connection to the domain could not be made.

Public Shared Function GetCurrentDomain () As Domain

summary.span: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

span.span: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

returns.span: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

span.span: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks método viene determinada por las credenciales de dominio en que se ejecuta la aplicación. method is determined by the domain credentials under which the application is running. Para recuperar el Unidos a un objeto que representa el dominio al que el equipo que ejecuta la aplicación, independientemente de las credenciales asociadas a esa aplicación, use el método en su lugar.To retrieve the object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined, regardless of the credentials associated with that application, use the method instead. ## Vea tambiénSee Also

exception.span: A connection to the current context could not be made.

span.span: A connection to the current context could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseDomainFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode domainMode) cil managed

param.name: domainMode
param.span: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.

summary.span: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks El valor se puede elevar, pero no Bajar.The value can be raised but not lowered. Esto significa que no es reversible elevar el nivel de funcionalidad del dominio y se debe realizar con cuidado la decisión de hacer esto.This means that raising the functionality level of the domain is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. Para obtener más información sobre los modos operativos de dominio, consulte [funcionalidad de dominios y bosques](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp).For more information about domain operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). La siguiente tabla define los valores válidos para `domainMode` según el modo de funcionamiento actual del dominio.The following table defines the valid values for `domainMode` based on the current operating mode of the domain. |Modo actualCurrent mode|Modo puede elevarse aMode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||



| ||| ||| ||NingunaNone|

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método repara la confianza restableciendo el canal seguro para la relación de confianza.This method repairs the trust by resetting the secure channel for the trust. Si se produce un error en la operación restablecer el canal seguro, a continuación, también restablecerá la contraseña de confianza.If the operation fails to reset the secure channel, then it will also reset the trust password.

param.span: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método se utiliza para comprobar que se ha establecido una relación de confianza totalmente.This method is used to verify that a trust relationship has been fully established. La relación de confianza no se establece hasta que se han creado ambos lados de la relación de confianza.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método comprueba que se ha establecido una relación de confianza totalmente.This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. La relación de confianza no se establece hasta que se han creado ambos lados de la relación de confianza.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
